name: Trash Quiz
description:
If there is a pop up that says: "Please note that Unity WebGL is not currently supported on mobiles. Press OK if you wish to continue anyway." don't worry! Press OK and wait for the game to load!

This is a simple game where you will see 9 pictures and a question. Answer the question by clicking the right pictures! Don't forget to submit after you are done with a question!

1. Once an item is clicked, it can not be unclicked so be careful!
2. There will be four questions where you have to answer which item belongs in which bin (plastic bin, paper bin, general bin and which items are reusable)
3. When an item is right, it will turn green, when an item is wrong, it will turn red!
4. After the four questions you will see your results and will get a short survey afterwards about that, so take notice of your results!

Thank you!
